# ohicore

The goal of ohicore is to ...  `ohicore` is a package of core functions for calculating the Ocean Health Index. For more, please visit [OHI-Science.org](http://ohi-science.org).

## Installation

You can install ohicore from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
if(){install.packages('devtools')}
devtools::install_github('ohi-science/ohicore')
```

See [ohi-science.org/toolbox-training](http://ohi-science.org/toolbox-training) for more information.
